name: zero_add
statement: theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by
proof:
induction n with
| zero =>
  rw [add_zero]
| succ d ih =>
  rw [add_succ, ih]
  exact rfl

name: succ_add
statement: theorem succ_add (a b : MyNat) : add (succ a) b = succ (add a b)  := by
proof:
induction b with
| zero =>
  rw [add_zero (succ a)]
  rw [add_zero a]
  exact rfl
| succ d ih =>
  rw [add_succ (succ a) d]
  rw [add_succ a d]
  rw [ih]
  exact rfl

name: add_comm
statement: theorem add_comm (a b : MyNat) : add a b = add b a := by
proof:
induction b with
| zero =>
  rw [add_zero, zero_add]
| succ d ih =>
  rw [add_succ]
  rw [succ_add]
  rw [ih]
  exact rfl

name: mul_pow
statement: theorem mul_pow (a b n : MyNat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
induction n with
| zero =>
  rw [pow_zero (mul a b)]
  rw [pow_zero a, pow_zero b]
  rw [one_mul]
| succ n ih =>
  rw [pow_succ (mul a b) n]
  rw [pow_succ a n]
  rw [pow_succ b n]
  rw [ih]
  rw [mul_assoc (pow a n) (pow b n) (mul a b)]
  rw [← mul_assoc (pow b n) a b]
  rw [mul_comm (pow b n) a]
  rw [← mul_assoc (pow a n) (mul a (pow b n)) b]
  rw [← mul_assoc (pow a n) a (pow b n)]
  rw [mul_assoc (mul (pow a n) a) (pow b n) b]

name: add_sq
statement: theorem add_sq (a b : MyNat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by

rw [add_mul a b (add a b)]
rw [mul_add a a b]

rw [add_left_comm (mul a a) (add (mul a b) (mul a b)) (mul b b)]
rw [add_comm (add (mul a b) (mul a b)) (add (mul a a) (mul b b))]
rw [← two_mul (mul a b)]
rw [← mul_assoc two a b]
rw [← pow_two a]
rw [← pow_two b]

name: add_right_cancel
statement: theorem add_right_cancel (a b n : MyNat) : add a n = add b n → a = b := by
proof:
intro h
induction n with
| zero =>
  rw [add_zero a] at h
  rw [add_zero b] at h
  exact h
| succ d ih =>
  rw [add_succ a d] at h
  rw [add_succ b d] at h
  apply ih
  apply succ_inj (add a d) (add b d)
  exact h

name: le_antisymm
statement: theorem le_antisymm (x y : MyNat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
cases hxy with
| intro a hya =>
  cases hyx with
  | intro b hxb =>
    have hx_eq1 : x = add x (add a b) := by
      rw [hya] at hxb
      rw [add_assoc] at hxb
      exact hxb
    have hx_eq2 := hx_eq1
    nth_rewrite 1 [← add_zero x] at hx_eq2
    have h_zero_addab : zero = add a b := by
      apply add_left_cancel (n := x) (a := zero) (b := add a b)
      exact hx_eq2
    have h_addab_zero : add a b = zero := by
      symm
      exact h_zero_addab
    have ha0 : a = zero := by
      apply add_right_eq_zero a b
      exact h_addab_zero
    have hy_eq : y = x := by
      rw [hya, ha0, add_zero]
    symm
    exact hy_eq

name: le_total
statement: theorem le_total (x y : MyNat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
revert y
induction x with
| zero =>
  intro y
  left
  exact zero_le y
| succ a ih =>
  intro y
  cases ih y with
  | inl h1 =>
    cases h1 with
    | intro c hc =>
      cases c with
      | zero =>
        right
        use one
        have hy : y = a := by
          rw [hc, add_zero]
        rw [succ_eq_add_one]
        rw [hy]
        exact rfl
      | succ d =>
        have hy : y = add (succ a) d := by
          rw [hc, add_succ]
          rw [← succ_add]
          exact rfl
        left
        use d
        exact hy
  | inr h2 =>
    cases h2 with
    | intro c hc =>
      right
      use add c one
      rw [succ_eq_add_one]
      rw [hc]
      rw [add_assoc]
      exact rfl

name: le_one
statement: theorem le_one (x : MyNat) (hx : le x one) : x = zero ∨ x = one := by
proof:
cases hx with
| intro c hc =>
  cases c with
  | zero =>
      rw [add_zero] at hc
      right
      symm
      exact hc
  | succ d =>
      rw [add_succ] at hc
      rw [one_eq_succ_zero] at hc
      have h0 : zero = add x d := by
        apply succ_inj zero (add x d)
        exact hc
      have hz : add x d = zero := by
        symm
        exact h0
      have hx0 : x = zero := by
        apply (add_right_eq_zero x d)
        exact hz
      left
      exact hx0

name: le_two
statement: theorem le_two (x : MyNat) (hx : le x two) : x = zero ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
intro x hx
cases x with
| zero =>
  left
  exact rfl
| succ d =>
  cases hx with
  | intro c hc =>
    right
    rw [two_eq_succ_one] at hc
    rw [succ_add] at hc
    cases (le_one d (Exists.intro c (succ_inj one (add d c) hc))) with
    | inl hdz =>
      left
      rw [hdz]
      rw [one_eq_succ_zero]
    | inr hd1 =>
      right
      rw [hd1]
      rw [two_eq_succ_one]

name: le_mul_right
statement: theorem le_mul_right (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b ≠ zero) : le a (mul a b) := by
proof:
have hbne : b ≠ zero := by
  apply mul_left_ne_zero a b
  exact h
cases eq_succ_of_ne_zero b hbne with
| intro n hb =>
  rw [hb]
  rw [le_iff_exists_add]

name: mul_right_eq_one
statement: theorem mul_right_eq_one (x y : MyNat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
-- zero ≠ one
  have hz01 : zero ≠ one := by
    intro h01
    rw [one_eq_succ_zero] at h01
    exact (zero_ne_succ zero) h01
  -- mul x y ≠ zero since it equals one
  have hmul_ne_zero : mul x y ≠ zero := by
    intro hz
    rw [h] at hz
    symm at hz
    exact hz01 hz
  -- get le x one via le_mul_right and rewriting by h
  have hxle1 : le x one := by
    have hle := le_mul_right x y hmul_ne_zero
    rw [h] at hle
    exact hle
  -- show x ≠ zero, otherwise zero_mul contradicts h
  have hx_ne_zero : x ≠ zero := by
    intro hx0
    have h' := h
    rw [hx0, zero_mul] at h'
    exact hz01 h'
  -- from x ≠ zero, we have 1 ≤ x
  have h1le : le one x := one_le_of_ne_zero x hx_ne_zero
  -- antisymmetry gives x = 1
  exact le_antisymm x one hxle1 h1le

name: mul_left_cancel
statement: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
revert h
revert c
induction b with
| zero =>
  intro c h
  rw [mul_zero] at h
  symm at h
  have hz := mul_eq_zero a c h
  cases hz with
  | inl ha0 =>
      contradiction
  | inr hc0 =>
      symm
      exact hc0
| succ d ih =>
  intro c h
  rw [mul_succ] at h
  have hcne : c ≠ zero := by
    intro hc
    rw [hc] at h
    rw [mul_zero] at h
    have hazero : a = zero := by
      apply add_left_eq_zero (mul a d) a
      exact h
    contradiction
  have hex := eq_succ_of_ne_zero c hcne
  cases hex with
  | intro e ceq =>
    rw [ceq] at h
    rw [mul_succ] at h
    have hcancel : mul a d = mul a e := by
      apply add_right_cancel (mul a d) (mul a e) a
      exact h
    have hde : d = e := by
      apply ih e
      exact hcancel
    rw [ceq]
    rw [hde]
    exact rfl
